trans-unit.source: Provides static methods to aid with remoting channel registration, resolution, and URL discovery.
trans-unit.target: 提供靜態方法，以利遠端處理通道註冊、 解析度和 URL 探索。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously dispatches the given message to the server-side chain(s) based on the URI embedded in the message.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式指定內嵌分派訊息至 URI 為基礎的用戶端鏈結的訊息中。

trans-unit.source: The current method returns immediately, whether the server processed the specified message or not.
trans-unit.target: 目前的方法會立即傳回，是否與否，伺服器會處理指定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message to dispatch.
trans-unit.target: 要分派的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The sink that will process the return message if it is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果它不會處理傳回訊息的接收<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl"></xref> object used to control the asynchronously dispatched message.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageCtrl"> </xref>物件用來控制非同步分派的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The msg parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The msg parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限。

trans-unit.source: Creates a channel sink chain for the specified channel.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的通道的通道接收鏈結。

trans-unit.source: The first provider in the chain of sink providers that will create the channel sink chain.
trans-unit.target: 將會建立通道接收鏈結的接收提供者的鏈結中的第一個提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver"></xref> for which to create the channel sink chain.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver"> </xref>要建立的通道接收鏈結。

trans-unit.source: A new channel sink chain for the specified channel.
trans-unit.target: 指定的通道新通道接收鏈結。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限。

trans-unit.source: Dispatches incoming remote calls.
trans-unit.target: 分派傳入遠端呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by channels to dispatch incoming remote calls.
trans-unit.target: 通道會使用這個方法來分派傳入遠端呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The stack of server channel sinks that the message already traversed.
trans-unit.target: 郵件已周遊接收的伺服器通道堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The message to dispatch.
trans-unit.target: 要分派的訊息。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"></xref> that holds the reply from the server to the message that is contained in the `msg` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"></xref>保存至訊息中包含來自伺服器回覆`msg`參數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ServerProcessing"></xref> that gives the status of the server message processing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ServerProcessing"> </xref>提供伺服器訊息處理的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The msg parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The msg parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns a registered channel with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定名稱的已註冊的通道。

trans-unit.source: The channel name.
trans-unit.target: 通道名稱。

trans-unit.source: An interface to a registered channel, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the channel is not registered.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的頻道的介面或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果尚未註冊通道。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of properties for a given proxy.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的屬性指定的 proxy。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The proxy to retrieve properties for.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的內容的 proxy。

trans-unit.source: An interface to the dictionary of properties, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no properties were found.
trans-unit.target: 字典的屬性、 介面或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到任何屬性。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the callers that is higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.
trans-unit.target: 至少其中一個是在呼叫堆疊中較高的呼叫端沒有設定遠端類型和通道的權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the URLs that can be used to reach the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可用來連線到指定之物件的所有 Url 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The object to retrieve the URL array for.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的 URL 陣列的物件。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that contains the URLs that can be used to remotely identify the object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if none were found.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，其中包含可用來從遠端識別物件的 Url 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到任何。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限。

trans-unit.source: Registers a channel with the channel services.
trans-unit.target: 與通道服務註冊通道。

trans-unit.source: RegisterChannel is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: RegisterChannel 已過時。

trans-unit.source: Please use <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.RegisterChannel%28System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel%2CSystem.Boolean%29> instead.
trans-unit.target: 請使用<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.RegisterChannel%28System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel%2CSystem.Boolean%29>改為。

trans-unit.source: The channel to register.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊通道。

trans-unit.source: The chnl parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The chnl parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The channel has already been registered.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊通道。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.
trans-unit.target: 至少一個呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端沒有設定遠端類型和通道的權限。

trans-unit.source: Registers a channel with the channel services.
trans-unit.target: 與通道服務註冊通道。

trans-unit.source: The channel to register.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊通道。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> ensures that security is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>可確保已啟用安全性。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Setting the value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> does not effect the security setting on the TCP or IPC channel.
trans-unit.target: 將值設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>不會影響在 TCP 或 IPC 通道的安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: The chnl parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The chnl parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The channel has already been registered.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊通道。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the callers higher in the call stack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.
trans-unit.target: 至少一個呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端沒有設定遠端類型和通道的權限。

trans-unit.source: Not supported in Windows 98 for <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref> and on all platforms for <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 不支援在 Windows 98 的<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel"></xref>和在所有平台上<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Host the service using Internet Information Services (IIS) if you require a secure HTTP channel.
trans-unit.target: 主機使用網際網路資訊服務 (IIS)，如果您需要安全的 HTTP 通道的服務。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of currently registered channels.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前已登錄通道的清單。

trans-unit.source: An array of all the currently registered channels.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的所有目前已登錄的通道。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously dispatches the incoming message to the server-side chain(s) based on the URI embedded in the message.
trans-unit.target: 以同步方式分派傳入訊息，URI 為基礎的用戶端鏈結至訊息中的內嵌。

trans-unit.source: The message to dispatch.
trans-unit.target: 要分派的訊息。

trans-unit.source: A reply message is returned by the call to the server-side chain.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器端鏈結的呼叫會傳回回覆訊息。

trans-unit.source: The msg parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The msg parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters a particular channel from the registered channels list.
trans-unit.target: 取消註冊已註冊的通道清單的特定通道。

trans-unit.source: The channel to unregister.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消註冊通道。

trans-unit.source: The chnl parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The chnl parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The channel is not registered.
trans-unit.target: 未註冊通道。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the callers higher in the callstack does not have permission to configure remoting types and channels.
trans-unit.target: 至少一個呼叫堆疊中較高層的呼叫端沒有設定遠端類型和通道的權限。
